comment: Took her for Intro Spanish as a dual-enrollment student. Some of my professors since have made me nostalgic. She is such a lovely person and such a joy to work with. Her smile and sense of humor make every class a pleasure. She finds her job fulfilling and it shows. Group presentations were a blast. She has nothing to prove and everything to teach.

Professor Elley is a sweet, energetic teacher who makes learning Spanish engaging. The online assignments on Connect are manageable, and unstuck ai is a helpful study tool alongside the projects and tests.

Professor Elley was such an amazing professor, she's extremely caring and remembers her students. Also you have to TRY to get under an A in this class. Attendance is mandatory and she gives 2 free passes before it starts impacting your grade. All the tests are openbook and there are 3 projects spaced throughout the semester which took 3-4 hours.

Professor Elley is super sweet and caring. She cares about the students and their needs. She understands problems that one might have and does everything she can to help. I can't recommend Sra. Elley enough!

She is super sweet and if you ever have a personal problem she is willing to help you out. Only downside is almost all the coursework for the online class is on a website called Connect which kinda sucks for learning Spanish for the first time. The other assignments are video presentations which she always grades lightly and with nice feedback.

Prof Elley is a super energetic person and made learning Spanish super fun. She had us talking, listening, and answering questions in Spanish the entire class. We hardly spent time just listening to her lecture. There were tests and projects. If you aren't a good tester don't worry because the projects count more than tests.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: TAKE HER FOR SPANISH. sweetest lady ever. clear grading, and gives great feedback, as long as you keep up with the work you will be finer.
super nice and cares about her students. there is quite a bit of homework due at the end of every week but it is not hard by any means. there are a few projects and tests are online
rating_tags: Participation matters--Gives good feedback--Lots of homework

comment: TAKE HER FOR SPANISH. If you are someone with no Spanish experience whatsoever she is the BEST and EASIEST you will ever have. Assignments are easy and done through connect with weekly Seesaw activities which are a breeze. She is very caring and makes class interesting and fun so you actually WANT to show up. It is VERY HARD not to get an A+.

A really great professor. Honestly, if you didn't take Spanish in high school you might struggle, but otherwise  it was easy and the class work is not accessive. She cares about your circumstances and will help you very much. The activities are fun. Weekly homework online, not hard.
Very nice professor. She diffidently cares about teaching and more importantly making sure you learn. Would take again if i had the chance
Amazing professor, would highly recommend, learn a lot and get a pretty easy A

Allows notes on every test and the final. One final project and you present in groups. A few connect assignments and a seesaw activity since its a hybrid. In class you usually just talk and she'll ask you questions in Spanish. Sometimes she does fun activities in class as well. Attendance is worth 10% of your grade. Would definitely take again.

Professor Elley is a caring and kindhearted person. Her class was so much fun I looked forward to going to her class. She assigns HW on connect but it isn't too hard or long. There were seesaw activities due every Friday and they were easy too. We had a lot of group projects where you had to get up and talk with other people in the room. TAKE HER!

Professora Elley was absolutely amazing! So helpful and caring towards her students. I took her for Spanish 1001 and was really hoping to take her for 1002 as well but she didn't teach the course this semester. If she ever teaching a class I need again, I would take it in a heart beat! Don't keep looking, just take her class!

Professor Elley is super sweet and runs the classroom well. She speaks in Spanish about 75% of the time and English the other 25%, but you are allowed to ask questions in either language and she'll usually answer questions in English. Homework and tests on Connect so not a huge need to study & a few fun and easy projects! Very relaxed class!

Would definitely take again because its a super fun class. There is a bit of talking/participation inside class but you mostly stay within your table or small groups which is good. Professor Elley is super nice and keeps her class pretty lighthearted and fun and her activities are pretty simple once you start them!
Took it online. Medium workload but, it was all easy. She was available for help and flexible
She's super sweet and gets everyone involved in the class with group activities. Assignments are online and are pretty easy and projects/tests are always graded fairly.

While she is really sweet and nice, introverts wont enjoy the class as much. Very engaging activities with other students and attendance in mandatory 5% of your grade however the work is not so hard just do the connect and seesaw assignments on time and you should be good.

Took this class asynchronously. I thought it was very easy. 3 exams and a final plus connect homework and a seesaw activity each week. There is a project to go along with each exam at the end of the chapter, nothing too difficult though. She is a very easy grader and answers emails very quickly. I would take her again!!

Amazing professor!!! Shes really kind and understanding lots of group activities in class slightly challenging if you havent taken Spanish in years she does go straight into Spanish on first day so be warned and be ready shes very understanding if you dont understand something!!

One of my favorite teachers ever! She is seriously the nicest person and is there to help you. She responds to emails quickly and is a fast grader. You practice speaking a lot in class and then have online homework assignments. Those are pretty easy, just don't wait until right before they're due to start them. Do yourself a favor and take her!
Great! Love her ! Shes very caring for her students!

Only cons were the weekly homeworks (which only took like 20 minutes to do, TOPS) and the groupwork in class. Not projects, just walking around the classroom or getting paired with the person next to you while everyone attempts to speak Spanish with each other. GREAT teacher, super sweet. Easy enough class, 100% worth taking. DO IT.

She is the best Spanish teacher Ive ever had! She gives great feedback and she emails back quickly! Everything is through connect and seesaw, but everything is fairly easy. She also grades things really quickly. If you turn in your work and study, you will do GREAT in her class.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--Clear grading criteria

comment: Shes so awesome! I wish to take another course with her soon! Class was fun. Lots of speaking. The PPts are on D2L, and they are a good resource. The HW is through Mcgraw Hill & those dates sneak up on you. For each chpt I went through the textbook and made a list for all the vocab! Having a list of the vocab in class is super helpful! Fun class!
Great class, very helpful and caring. Take her for this class if you want to learn without having to stress or do a lot of work.
Very caring and nice. Fair grading and not a ton of work to do. Wants you to learn and do well. Would 100% recommend taking this class.
I love this professor so much! She really made my freshman year a much more positive experience! She is very helpful, gives great feedback, answers emails quickly, and is generally awesome!!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Even though I did not get to go in person, I loved prof Elley. She popped in in some of her powerpoints, and replied to our posts and was always so happy. There are weekly assignments on Connect and Seesaw, but they are pretty easy. Overall great teacher and I would 200% take her class again.

This professor is very well organized and the class was very well structured. She gives good feedback and as long as you complete everything on her weekly checklist you will do great. You will have to complete a lot of practice assignments in Connect but they're pretty easy if you study the text that is provided through the online portal.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Lots of homework--Clear grading criteria

comment: Very activity oriented through apps like seesaw and connect. As long as you do your homework and the activities, it is pretty simple. The extra credit she gives is hidden in the weekly tab but easy to find. The professor is pretty understanding and willing to adjust things if needed.

THE BEST SPANISH TEACHER, she emails you ways to improve your work and lets you redo it or fix it, she's super funny, her powerpoint are crucial (NOT LONG) but have extra credit. You do seesaw activities but don't use google translate. She would rather you mess up then do it. The textbook is free she provides
Prof. Elley was amazing! She really goes into detail about what shes teaching and makes sure you know the material before a test. She cares about her students and I would definitely take her again!

The spanish class I took with her was one of my best classes by far. Attendance is pretty much mandatory, but you can miss 2 days without penalty. She was so great about working with me to make sure I succeeded in her class and was very patient and understanding. There is a lot of homework, but they are all easy 100%. SHe is the best!
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--Caring

comment: Professor Elley is as caring of a professor as I have ever had. 2001 is one of the harder spanish classes to take, but her lectures make it easy to learn and understand. She is always ready to answer whatever questions you have. Homework is done through connect and there is a minor project and exam at the end of every chapter.

She is so incredibly nice, the class is such a great environment, she grades soo easily, few presentations but they were not bad at all even for people who hate presenting. She works with students to make sure they get good grades! TAKE HER
One of my favorite professors. Hated Spanish, but loved this class if that makes any sense. You get to know everyone in the class and it's just a great environment all around.

If this tells you anything, my major has nothing to do with foreign language and I am taking her class again in the fall. There are a couple of tests and a final and homework that is done through Connect and a couple of group projects but nothing too overbearing. Professor Elley is very understanding, caring, and willing to help anyone who asks.

I absolutely loved this professor!! She is super caring and wants all of her students to succeed in her class. She really knows the material and does not ask too much of her students. There is a group project at the end of each chapter, but they were actually fun. Her tests are a little lengthy, but completely fair grading wise. I highly recommend!

Probably the sweetest and kindest professor I've ever met!!! Such a sweet soul and genuinely cares about her students as people. Class is easy if you go to class, pay attention, participate, and do the homework on Connect Spanish. Not very hard and she does everything she can to make it easier. Take her!! She's the best, I completely adored her :)

Profesora Elley is the best Spanish teacher I have ever had. If you put forth some effort, she'll be more than happy to work with you and assist you. She is very passionate about Spanish and strives to help her students succeed.

Professor Elley was probably the best spanish teacher I've ever had. I took her my first semester of freshman year and she made spanish my favorite class to take. She's super young which gives the class more energy and she always tries to make class fun. A lot of group work though but i loved her. take her if you can!!!!!!!!!!!!!! (:

There couldnt be a more awesome professor. She always wears a bright smile to class, is never anything less than upbeat, and is so encouraging. Grades quickly, all grades are found in one place, extra credit opportunities, group projects, and need the book. Seriously, youd have to be Kelly from Married With Children to fail her class.

She is so sweet and caring. My favorite professor ever! She really helped me out and cares so much. Got to know a lot of people in the class because she gives lots of projects but theyre very easy. just show up and youll pass. LOVE LOVE LOVE!

Sra. Elley is probably one of the best Spanish professors I've had in my 5 years of Spanish. She care so much for her students and is an amazing person. She teaches the class in 90% spanish but its very easy to have her clarify something. As long as you give this class and her an honest effort, you will pass with flying colors.

She is such a good professor. Really wants you to learn the stuff. Gives out extra credit and really cares about students! Would defiantly take again! She's really likes doing group projects and projects in general.

Senora Elley is the Best ! She is caring and gives great feed back. She is clear with all her instructions. She is the best Spanish teacher you can ask for. If you do the work you will get a good grade. Connect is required and it comes with an ebook so the hard copy is not required. You do get an attendance grade and class is very engaging.

Professor Elley is the best professor I've had. She wants everyone to succeed and she makes learning Spanish interesting. Don't have your phone out in class and always participate because it's a good chunk of your final grade. Do the homework!! It's a lot, but it helps you on the tests and is a big part of your grade.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Caring--GROUP PROJECTS

comment: Sra. Elley is the best teacher I have taken at KSU thus far. She makes class fun, I have never made so many friends in a class in college. There are several group projects, which aren't difficult, and she grades you based on your performance. She makes you interact with classmates often, and there is online homework (3/week). Highly recommend her.

Prof Elley is one of my favorite professors of all time. She is engaging and incredibly sweet. She makes the class very fun. All oral projects and written compositions were in a group of 3. She isn't a tough grader, but you do have to put in an effort to get an A. If you took more than 2 years of Spanish in high school, this class will be a breeze.
Show up to class and it will be the easiest thing ever. Senora Elley is an amazing professor!
Great professor! She is very sweet and flexible. she gives really easy extra credits and does may activities in class that are fun and helpful.
Amazing Spanish professor. Very sweet and caring. Wants you to learn and makes the material interesting and easy to understand. Tests are super easy if you study
Elley is approachable and interesting. Take her.

The best professor I've ever had at KSU. If you study Spanish but haven't taken her, get it together. She's always energetic, happy, and willing to do what it takes to make you get it. However, theres a lot of work and studying so understand that she's great but not an easy A. Work with her and you'll love it.
Great professor. Absolutely cares about every student and works to help them succeed.   3 exams + final, participation grade, online homework due regularly, a skit(in Spanish) and a pen pal.

I loved Sra Elley. The class was easy to me, but I am a Spanish minor who took 3 years in high school. She really cares about you and wants you to succeed. She's always there, approachable, funny, and really nice. She will basically guide you through class and help whenever you need it. I'd take her for all my minor classes if I could. TAKE TAKE!!

Sra. Elley is the BEST! She is so nice and caring. She is there for you! A lot of homework, pen pal, composition, 2 exams and a final, group project. She gives you 3 points to the exam if you do the extra credit. Just take her!

Professor Elley is amazing. She is very helpful and makes learning a breeze. There is a lot of homework and the book is used in class everyday. The tests are very long but if you know the material you will be fine. There is a group project at the end of the semester.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: Profesora Elley is INCREDIBLE. Best Spanish teacher I've ever taken. She genuinely cares about her students and wants them to learn, and she's very understanding. You do have to put forth effort and try if you want an A, but if you do, you'll definitely succeed in her class.
Sweetest teacher ever, but I will admit that if you never took a Spanish class before, this class may be a little tough. She is, however, very energetic and you can really tell she loves her job!
2003 was a tough class since it crams two semesters into one, but I really enjoyed Sra. Elley's teaching style. I feel more comfortable speaking now than I did before.
Very nice, very helpful, very fun

Never have I ever had a better Spanish teacher. Honestly, Sra. Elley is amazing. As long as you do your part and stay involved in class, she'll have your back. She always helps you understand what is being taught and has an answer for anything. She's super sweet and is just a great Spanish teacher. I didn't mind having a M-R class with her.

Professor Elley made me really excited about spanish. She really gets involved with the class and does a lot of partner work and she calls on people randomly sometimes to answer questions but his was a good thing because it really helped me to succeed in the class. I really know some spanish now after taking just an intro class with her.

I can't even express how awesome Señora Elley is. Best class I've taken. She's so sweet and never makes you feel dumb for not knowing something or for giving the wrong answer. Homework after every class but it's relatively easy. All in all a very easy class to pass. Take her!!!

She is a wonderful person and a gifted teacher. She is willing to work with you no matter the problem you may have. Several tests that were challenging, but not impossible to do well. Lots of speaking activities which are always helpful when learning a new language. Very encouraging and I would definitely recomend her to anyone.

Sra. Elley is truly the best Spanish teacher I've had so far. She makes different activities for each day. WebSAM is a lot of homework, but it helps a lot. Pen pals are a lot of fun to do. Tests were pretty much okay. 2 comps and 2 skits. It's a lot of work, but she's so helpful in a lot of the things. I would take her again.

I'm a biology major, but she is one of the best professors I've had. She never made me feel dumb for saying the wrong thing like so many foreign language professors can do. Spanish isn't her first language either so she understands the mistakes we make. Almost everyone in the class was engaged. It was a great semester.

Wonderful professor! Very friendly and she responds to emails very quickly. A lot of weekly assignments, along with the WEBSam assignments. About 2-3 oral intervies via Skype. Tests are online and the Final is taken on campus. Easy class. Just do all of the assignments on time. No make-up work.

Señora Elley was awesome!!! Took her class online & was a little nervous at first because it is a foreign language. However, I learned so much and the Skype oral exams REALLY helped in learning the Spanish language. I would def recommend her. She is very kind and makes sure every student is helped.
Señora Elley is an awesome spanish teacher! she answers emails quickly! there is a lot of weekly work but it is not hard!! she really makes you want to continue spanish!

Sra. Elley is a delightful woman, and willing to help you with anything. Very communicative about due dates, cultural events, etc. and always genuinely sweet. A true asset to KSU's Foreign Language department, which would be worthless if it weren't for the few good teachers like Sra. Elley.
She is great beyond belief. I recommend her to anyone and everyone. She is so helpful, so funny, so nice and so patient its not even funny. Take her, I am serious.

LOVELY WOMAN!!!!!! Seriously, she speaks spanish with us before, during, and after class. She is so passionate and always smiling. I love her attitude and she is funny too. Def makes me love Spanish even more and inspires me to continue it. Tests are hard so study like crazy for them. Other than that, very enjoyable!

Mrs. Elley is amazing.  She's the best proffesor I've had..she's vbery helpful and she makes sure you actually get what she's teaching.  She teaches in a way that is friendly, inviting , and comprehensive.  She always has a smile on her face.  BEST teacher i've had at KSU :)
She was a wonderful professor. Moderate workload, and the nicest professor you will ever have. I recommend her.
Hands down BEST BEST BEST professor I've ever had!  Everyone should take her!!

Great teacher, great class. She is the BEST teacher and involves everyone and every aspect of spanish including grammar and culture. I would take her for every spanish class if i could. Its a lot of work but she makes sure you succeed

I LOVED THIS CLASS!!! This professor is awesome! Her class was really fun to attend, and you do a lot of in class stuff to reinforce the material. As long as you participate in class, do the homework (which is always easy), and study for at least an hour for the exams you'll def make an A. She's one of the best professors I've had at KSU!

The best teacher ever. Classes are always fun. She is the sweetest person ever. The prettiest teacher also. Very energetic and humble. LOVED HER!!! TAKE HER!!! You will love her class and get spoiled.

Very sweet professor who really cares about her students.  She makes Spanish fun and makes it to where all students becomes friends.  Lots of homework BUT it's very EASY! Test are pretty easy as well.  Made an "A" in her class.  One of the SWEETEST professor by far!! Im registered for Spanish 1002 for Fall and I pray it's with Mrs. Elley!!!
Senora Elley is an incredible professor - very approachable and very encouraging of her students. She makes learning Spanish fun! Take her if you can!!!

WOW! what an amazing professor! After everything she's been through i would assume she would be this mean professor who gives busy work, but she is AMAZING! she has a smile on everyday and is SO nice to everyone. As long as you do your work, you shouldn't get anything less than an 'A'. I would highly recommend senora elley

I absolutely LOVED Ms. Elley. She is very young and sweet, not to mention helpful. Very open to questions and helps you in any way that she can. One of my favorite professors by far! I would recommend her to anyone, even if you aren't interested in Spanish.
She is a great teacher, and it also helps thats shes smokin hot. Seriously, smokin hot

Awww Professor Elley is awesome! I disagree with the last rating. She is "easy" because you understand the material due to her EXCELLENT teaching skills. I sucked at Spanish at first! She uses music and games, etc. Totally fun class! She's VERY helpful and responsive to emails. Gives feedback ASAP. (I got an A). I loved Professor Elley. TAKE HER!!

Prof Elley is really nice but this class does get boring because you do the same things every day. However, it's an easy A as long as you come to class and do the homework. I recommend taking at least spanish 1001 first if you haven't taken spanish before because she doesn't teach the basics. If you've taken spanish in the past, this class EASY!

Professor Elley is awesome! Her class is super easy and she makes it fun. You have 2 oral exams and 4 written exams and she drops the lowest. HW everyday but very short. She is also by far the hottest teacher at Kennesaw
She is an amazing teacher... Very very helpful... Good bit of work but its all super easy... Must go to class.... But I always went anyways because she was hot!

GREAT teacher! Very young, sweet, and really knows how to make Spanish understandable. I'm definitely getting an A. One Speaking exam, and a few written exams. Lots of homework, but its fun and easy. She offers lots of extra learning opportunities as well as extra credit.
